meanings.definition: A thin strip of material used to wrap around a body part before applying a bandage.
meanings.sent1: She carefully applied the prewraps around her injured wrist before putting on the bandage.
meanings.sent2: The athlete always keeps prewraps in her sports bag for quick first aid.
meanings.sent3: The prewraps decided to have a race around the arm before the bandage joined in.
meanings.sent4: The prewraps were like gentle hugs around the sore elbow, comforting and secure.
meanings.sent5: The colorful prewraps danced around the wrist, adding a touch of fun to the injury.

meanings.definition: To wrap with a thin strip of material before applying a bandage.
meanings.sent1: He carefully prewraps his ankle before every game to prevent injuries.
meanings.sent2: She prewraps the gauze tightly around the wound to ensure it stays in place.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to prewraps its tail with a ribbon for a fancy look.
meanings.sent4: His words prewraps her heart with warmth and comfort in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The wind gently prewraps the leaves in a swirling dance, creating a beautiful pattern.
